file_content.text: Must you leave so soon?
Lord Raxxus is no more.
Pity he had to be removed. He had some admirable qualities. Would've liked to indulge in one last... ah, I babble.
The Dark Council will know of your accomplishment. And here is a little extra something. From me.
Don't keep me waiting.
Such power, such potential. The things I could teach you....
Ooh, a bounty hunter. Expensive, no doubt. But I can see you're worth every credit.
Ooh, look at the pretties. Much more interesting than the boors I'm surrounded with.
I ask for the best, and the Empire sends exactly that. Lucky me.
I am Lord Shaar. But please, call me... whatever you like.
Pleased to meet you.
Yes, likewise.
And you will address me as my station dictates.
Don't get chummy with me.
I can think of a few colorful names you may not enjoy.
Be careful what you wish for.
Hands off the merchandise.
Back off, lady.
I'll just stick to formalities, if you don't mind.
"Lord Shaar" is fine.
Evasive. I like.
What are you up to?
I offer much. All you have to do is ask.
Perhaps you can help me find an old acquaintance: Lord Raxxus. Dear man, very... vigorous in his time.
Imprisoned here some twenty years ago. Seems the terms of his release were omitted from the Treaty of Coruscant.
Can't imagine he liked being left here to rot.
Bet he isn't happy about that.
No, though he shouldn't have been surprised.
You want me to free him.
He is to be rescued?
Ha. Not exactly.
Not my concern.
Raxxus was a known radical. Had several enemies in the Dark Council. Was marked for death when the Jedi captured him.
Whoever slays him is all but guaranteed the Dark Council's favor. And mine.
Leave it to me.
And here I thought I'd have to beg.
Keep your favor. I want money.
As you wish.
What's in this for you?
Raxxus and I were... close, once. I was young, impressionable. A demonstration of my loyalties is long overdue.
Lord Raxxus is a cunning Sith, very influential with the rabble here. He's amassed a considerable following.
These thralls will protect Raxxus with their lives. Consider them equally expendable.
No deal. [Refuse quest]
Pity. You don't know what you're missing.
Not every prisoner is getting a warm welcome.
